about_the_game:
This downloadable content includes:
  • Terror Bay Mutantneers Team – The most anticipated and requested new DLC team by the MFL community is finally here! The Mutantneers made the most noise of any team this year by signing the GOAT, QB Bomb Shady to lead their team. Shady has a stellar cast on offense, along with a formidable defense and is ready to make a playoff run. Terror Bay is on a tear!
  • Slayman Maimes Stadium – play against or as Mutantneers in Slayman Maimes Stadium, one of the most dangerous stadiums in the league. This pirate themed stadium has crashing waves and a pirate ship that fires cannonballs at visiting teams.

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League and its addons features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

The Mutantneers made the most noise of any team this year by signing the GOAT, QB Bomb Shady to lead their team. Shady has a stellar cast on offense, along with a formidable defense and is ready to make a playoff run. Terror Bay is on a tear!
  • Slayman Maimes Stadium – play against or as Mutantneers in Slayman Maimes Stadium, one of the most dangerous stadiums in the league. This pirate themed stadium has crashing waves and a pirate ship that fires cannonballs at visiting teams.

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
